meanings.definition: Cells that form enamel in teeth.
meanings.sent1: The ameloblasts are responsible for creating the hard outer layer of teeth.
meanings.sent2: Dentists study the role of ameloblasts in tooth development.
meanings.sent3: The ameloblasts in my mouth must be working overtime to keep my teeth strong!
meanings.sent4: Like tiny artists, ameloblasts carefully paint enamel onto teeth.
meanings.sent5: Under a microscope, the ameloblasts look like busy little workers building tooth armor.
